definition: Qi, a Zhou Dynasty vassal state/surname Qi

sentences.english: Pregnant and nursing mom’s should also not consume goji.
sentences.chinese: 而且，孕婦和處於護理期的母親是被禁止服用枸杞的。

sentences.english: What makes Goji berries good for you?
sentences.chinese: 枸杞有何之處對你有益？

sentences.english: Some people add them to soups, teas and wine.
sentences.chinese: 還有人喜歡加枸杞到湯，茶或者是白酒中。

sentences.english: The optimum Sugar degree was 130BX to the lactic acid fermented drink.
sentences.chinese: 乳酸發酵枸杞綠茶飲料以調糖度130BX風味最好。

sentences.english: Direct use of medlar, mouth chewing absorption of nutrients in more fully.
sentences.chinese: 直接用嘴嚼，對枸杞中營養成分的吸收會更加充分。

sentences.english: Cuttage propagation of Chinese wolf-berry(Lycium chinense) was studied.
sentences.chinese: 以細葉枸杞爲試材，研究了枸杞的扦插繁殖。

sentences.english: Cuttage propagation of Chinese wolf-berry(Lycium chinense) was studied.
sentences.chinese: 以細葉枸杞爲試材，研究了枸杞的扦插繁殖。

sentences.english: At present the products of lycium barbarum have initiatively reached the ministerial standards issued for non - polluted foods in China.
sentences.chinese: 枸杞產品已基本符合無公害食品的部頒標準。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the positive regulation of lycium barbarum polysaccharide on immunofunction.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討枸杞多糖對小鼠免疫功能的正向調節作用。

sentences.english: It was found that Cirrospilus pictus Nee can parasitize in cecidium of Aceria pallida Keifer for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 首次發現普通瑟姬小蜂可寄生於枸杞癭蟎蟲癭內。

sentences.english: Goji Gold contains phytonutrients and unique lycium barbarum polysaccharides.
sentences.chinese: 枸杞含有動物養分素和獨特的黃金枸杞多糖。

sentences.english: Goji Gold contains phytonutrients and unique lycium barbarum polysaccharides.
sentences.chinese: 枸杞含有動物養分素和獨特的黃金枸杞多糖。

sentences.english: Closer shot of LBP box with the T-Shirt ball.
sentences.chinese: 更緊密拍攝中的枸杞多醣與T恤球。

sentences.english: To listen to adults, this is what we often say medlar.
sentences.chinese: 聽大人們說，這就是我們常說的枸杞子。

sentences.english: Chinese Wolfberry nourishes the liver and kidney.
Objective To study the effects of microelement selenium on the antioxidant system of Lycium barbarum.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究微量元素硒對寧夏枸杞抗氧化系統的影響。

definition: huangqi/milk vetch root (used in TCM)/Astragalus membranaceus or Astragalus mongholicus
Gorgon fruit/Semen euryales (botany)/see also 雞頭米|鸡头米[ji1 tou2 mi3]
dwarf lilyturf (Ophiopogon japonicus), its tuber used in TCM
